API_Description: Represents the starting position of the text selection within a text field or text area during an event.
API_Description_Reason: The name 'selStart' suggests it is related to the selection start position, commonly used in text input contexts.
Returns: The index of the starting position of the text selection.
Returns_Reason: Selection start positions are typically represented as numerical indices indicating the position within the text.

type.description: The data type of the selStart property, which is expected to be a number representing the index.
type.description_reason: The property is likely to be a numerical index, as it represents a position within a text string.
type.type_reason: Index positions in text are typically represented as numbers.
